Item(by='pthreads', descendants=123, kids=[25161481, 25176133, 25175140, 25175233, 25175084, 25177586, 25183750, 25177124, 25175080, 25178713, 25176949, 25177335, 25175583, 25177113, 25163569, 25163300, 25176898, 25176165, 25175092, 25175530, 25175565, 25175720, 25178023, 25175510, 25175734, 25175191, 25160008, 25175749, 25176736, 25175434, 25179346, 25176016, 25161610, 25176972, 25177805, 25174993, 25176056, 25177107, 25177402, 25160609, 25175141, 25178985, 25178183, 25177446, 25175083, 25175681, 25175628, 25159943, 25175639, 25175617, 25177207, 25175711, 25170756, 25176920, 25175363, 25175657, 25177209, 25175506, 25178016, 25177967, 25175637, 25183958], score=170, time=1605876494, title='Ask HN: What are some of your favorite journals or magazines?', item_type='story', url=None, parent=None, text='Recently a bookstore near me that used to carry lots of interesting periodicals (including my favorite 2600) stopped all of them. So I have decided to subscribe directly. What are some of your favorite magazines&#x2F;journals (tech and non-tech) that you love and wish would last for a long time to come.')
